full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I DMIGS RIM KHYER BDE'I LHAN THABS 'DON SGRIGS SU BKOD PA DNGOS GRUB GTER MDZOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @034B ZHES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I DMIGS RIM 'KHYER BDE'I LHAN THABS 'DON SGRIGS SU 'DI YANG KUN MKHYEN CHEN PO LCANG SKYA @035A *, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG YE SHES BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME DPAL BZANG POS, SKU GONG MAS MDZAD PA'I DMIGS RIM DE LA LHAN THABS BSNAN NAS RI BO RTZE LNGA'I RDO RJE'I PHUG GI RI KHROD PA RNAMS KYI TSOGS 'DON DU, KUN TU BDE BA'I TSAL GYI SGRUB KHANG AE WAm DGA' 'KHYIL NAS GNANG BA'I PHYAG BZHES JI LTA BA BZHIN BRIS PA 'DI KYANG 'JAM MGON BLA MA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO 'DI, NYI PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,` 'GRO BA THAMS CAD LA DGE 'BAR GYUR CIG , @035B RGYAL YUM LEGS BSHAD GSUNG RAB SNYING PO'I BCUD, ,GCIG TU BSDUS PA BYANG CHUB LAM RIM GYI, ,NYE LAM MDOR BSDUS SPAR DU SGRUB PA'I DGES, ,RGYUD SBYOR 'DIS MTSON MKHA' MNYAM 'GRO KUN GYI, ,SA LAM SGRUB PA'I 'GAL RKYEN ZHI BA DANG, ,SKYES BU GSUM GYI LAM GYI RIM PA YI, ,RTOGS PA MA LUS MYUR DU SKYES BA DANG, ,SKU BZHI'I RGYAL SA MCHOG LA DBANG BAR SHOG ,@036A *, ,(ZHES 'DI LTA BU'I SBYAR BYANG DGOS TSUL KO SHRI BKRA SHIS RAB BRTAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, LCANG SKYA HO THOG THUS SBYAR BA'O, BKRA SHIS, ,)
